languages.text: "Да. Это — начало ее жития. Известно, что она жила в мире, где произошло страшное восстание еретиков. Они уничтожили там все живое — кроме тех, кого святая Арджента смогла спасти при помощи Единственной звезды. И силы своей веры".

"Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."
languages.original_text: "Да. Это — начало ее жития. Известно, что она жила в мире, где произошло страшное восстание еретиков. Они уничтожили там все живое — кроме тех, кого святая Арджента смогла спасти при помощи Единственной звезды. И силы своей веры".

They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “没错，那就是她传奇生涯的开端。众所周知，她生活的世界遭遇了动荡，那个世界的异端分子发动了一场可怕的叛乱。他们消灭了整颗行星上的所有生命——除了阿洁塔靠着命运之星与信仰的力量救下来的那些人。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."

traits.locale_text: “没错，那就是她传奇生涯的开端。众所周知，她生活的世界遭遇了动荡，那个世界的异教徒发动了一场可怕的叛乱。他们消灭了整颗行星上的所有生命——除了阿洁塔靠着命运之星与信仰的力量救下来的那些人。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."

languages.text: «Sí. Así empieza su hagiografía. Sabemos que vivía en un mundo donde los herejes organizaron una insurrección espantosa. No dejaron a nadie con vida en el planeta, a excepción de aquellos a quienes Argenta logró salvar con la Estrella Única y la fuerza de su fe».
languages.original_text: "Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Así empieza su hagiografía. Sabemos que vivía en un mundo donde los herejes organizaron una insurrección espantosa. No dejaron a nadie con vida en el planeta, a excepción de aquellos a quienes Argenta logró salvar con la Estrella Única y la fuerza de su fe».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そう、それが彼女の聖伝の始まりだった。彼女が住んでいた世界では、異端者たちが恐ろしい反乱を起こしたことが知られている。彼らは、聖アルジェンタが一つ星、そして彼女の信仰の強さによって救うことができた人々以外の、惑星上のすべての生命を絶滅させたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."

traits.locale_text: 「そう、それが彼女の聖伝の始まりだった。彼女が住んでいた世界では、異端者たちが恐ろしい反乱を起こしたことが知られている。彼らは、聖アルジェンタが一つ星、そして彼女の信仰の強さによって救うことができた人々以外の、惑星上のすべての生命を絶滅させたのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Das war der Beginn ihrer Hagiografie. Man weiß, dass sie auf einer Welt lebte, auf der Ketzer einen schrecklichen Aufstand anzettelten. Sie löschten sämtliches Leben auf dem Planeten aus — bis auf jene, welche die Heilige Argenta mit dem Einen Stern retten konnte. Und mit der Kraft ihres Glaubens."
languages.original_text: "Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Das war der Beginn ihrer Hagiografie. Man weiß, dass sie auf einer Welt lebte, auf der Ketzer einen schrecklichen Aufstand anzettelten. Sie löschten sämtliches Leben auf dem Planeten aus — bis auf jene, welche die Heilige Argenta mit dem Einen Stern retten konnte. Und mit der Kraft ihres Glaubens."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui. Il s'agit du commencement de son hagiographie. Nous savons qu'elle a vécu sur un monde où des hérétiques ont organisé une terrible insurrection. Ils ont éradiqué toute vie sur la planète, à l'exception de celles que Sainte Argenta est parvenue à sauver grâce à l'Étoile unique. Et grâce à la puissance de sa foi. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Il s'agit du commencement de son hagiographie. Nous savons qu'elle a vécu sur un monde où des hérétiques ont organisé une terrible insurrection. Ils ont éradiqué toute vie sur la planète, à l'exception de celles que Sainte Argenta est parvenue à sauver grâce à l'Étoile unique. Et grâce à la puissance de sa foi. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Evet. Hayat hikâyesinin başlangıcı böyledir. Kâfirlerin feci bir isyan çıkardığı bir dünyada yaşamış, bu kadarı biliniyor. Kâfirler o dünyadaki her canlıyı katletmiş. Ancak Azize Argenta'nın Emsalsiz Yıldız'la ve sarsılmaz inancıyla korudukları kurtulabilmiş."
languages.original_text: "Yes. That was the beginning of her hagiography. It is known that she lived on a world where heretics staged a terrible insurrection. They wiped out all life on the planet — except those whom Saint Argenta managed to save with the One Star. And with the strength of her faith."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Hayat hikâyesinin başlangıcı böyledir. Kâfirlerin feci bir isyan çıkardığı bir dünyada yaşamış, bu kadarı biliniyor. Kâfirler o dünyadaki her canlıyı katletmiş. Ancak Azize Argenta'nın Emsalsiz Yıldız'la ve sarsılmaz inancıyla korudukları kurtulabilmiş."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
